SEARCH
Package me.squidxtv.frameui.core.action.scroll

Interface Scrollable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Screen
public interface Scrollable
Represents an element that can be scrolled.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ScrollEventHandler
    getOnScroll()
    Returns the current ScrollEventHandler for this element.
    default void
    scroll(PlayerItemHeldEvent event, ScrollDirection direction, int scrollX, int scrollY)
    Performs a scroll on the element.
    void
    setOnScroll(ScrollEventHandler scrollEventHandler)
    Sets the current ScrollEventHandler for this element

  • Method Details

    • scroll

      default void scroll(PlayerItemHeldEvent event, ScrollDirection direction, int scrollX, int scrollY)
      Performs a scroll on the element.
      Parameters:
      event - the event that causes this scroll interaction
      direction - the direction of the scroll
      scrollX - the x-coordinate on the element
      scrollY - the y-coordinate on the element

    • getOnScroll

      ScrollEventHandler getOnScroll()
      Returns the current ScrollEventHandler for this element.
      Returns:
      the current ScrollEventHandler for this element

    • setOnScroll

      void setOnScroll(ScrollEventHandler scrollEventHandler)
      Sets the current ScrollEventHandler for this element
      Parameters:
      scrollEventHandler - the new scroll event handler
